thread.title: Your 6 Monday Picks: 2017 Grammy Awards Edition
thread.title_full: Your 6 Monday Picks: 2017 Grammy Awards Edition

author: Celebuzz
title: Your 6 Monday Picks: 2017 Grammy Awards Edition
text:
1. Beyoncé’s Visually Stunning Medley of Songs from Lemonade Beyonce’s full performance RT to save a life #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/0xtYLEC6xD 
2. Adele Curses and Asks to Restart Her George Michael Tribute Performance 
Watch Adele’s tribute to George Michael in full here: pic.twitter.com/LmsfYFKMaG 
— Adele Daily (@AdeleDailyInfo) February 13, 2017 
3. Lady Gaga’s Performance with Metallica , Also Ridden with Technical Difficulties 
5. Chance the Rapper Performs “How Great” / “All We Got” with Kirk Franklin , Francis and the Lights , Tamela Mann , and a Gospel Choir 
Chance The Rapper, Kirk Franklin and Tamela Mann brought the church to the #GRAMMYs 2017 pic.twitter.com/bB51vkTasu 
— What’s Trending Sa (@whatstrendingSa) February 13, 2017 
6. Adele Breaks Her Grammy for Album of the Year in Half After Declaring that it Belongs to Beyoncé 
“I can’t possibly accept this award,” said Adele. “The Lemonade album was just so monumental, Beyoncé. It was so monumental and well thought-out and beautiful and soul-bearing… we appreciate that. All of us artists here adore you. You are our light.” Advertisement
